title: Large-Scale Mathematics Learning Framework Design for Building an Inclusive Digital Campus

context.prior_knowledge: Basic LMS (Learning Management System) usage skills and foundational knowledge of secondary-level mathematics
context.additional_context: Corporate re-education program for multicultural learner groups

learning_goals: Learners can explain secondary mathematics concepts (functions, statistics, geometry) with over 80% accuracy using digital campus platform tools (virtual whiteboards, AI tutors, etc.).
Learners can establish and apply customized learning strategies reflecting cultural diversity factors (multilingual support, asynchronous discussions) identified through O-FGDs.
Learners can improve self-directed problem-solving skills in digital learning environments by over 70% through formative assessments (weekly quizzes, peer evaluations).
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
